title: Sri Lanka sells Rs50bn of Treasury bonds
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka has sold 50 billion rupees of Treasury bonds after calling bids for 50 billion, data from the state debt office showed.
20 billion rupees of 01 June 2025 bonds were sold at 20.30 percent after calling bids for 20 billion.
30 billion rupees of 15 January 2028 bonds were sold at 20.19 percent after calling bids for 30 billion.
The sales were around secondary market yields a day earlier. (Colombo/ June 11/2022)
